wisheshitha karyayan sandaha balaya lath aayathanawalata, wisheshayenma nithiwedin saha winishchayakarawarun ge swadhinathwaya pilibanda wishesha niyojithayanta, manawa himikam kriyakarikayanta, prakashanaye nidahasa, sanwidhanaya wime saha raswime nidahasa pilibanda wishesha niyojithayanta, nithiwirodhi saha aththanomathika ghathana pilibanda wishesha niyojithayanta suluthara prajawange ayithin pilibanda wishesha niyojithayanta , balahathkari athurudankirim pilibanda karya kandayamata, sthrinta erehi salakili pilibanda wishesha niyojithayanta, badhakirimwalin thorawa siya katayuthu karaganima awashya prawesha marga sampadanaya karana lesa mathuwa athi dadi illimwalata widhimath lesa prathichara dakwana lesa shri lanka rajayen illa sitiyi
